text: The 72nd Infantry Division (, 72-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army. It was mobilized twice, in 1904–1905 for the Russo-Japanese War and in 1914–1918 for World War I.Армейская пехота. "Army infantry" . ria1914.info, Russian military records. Retrieved July 22, 2018. ==Organization== *1st Brigade **285th Infantry Regiment **286th Infantry Regiment *2nd Brigade **287th Infantry Regiment **288th Infantry Regiment ==References== Category:Infantry divisions of the Russian Empire
title: 72nd Infantry Division (Russian Empire)
